Title: Adopts the interstate teacher mobility compact
Summary: Adopts the interstate teacher mobility compact to facilitate the mobility of teachers across member states, with the goal of supporting teachers through new pathways to licensure; establishes a regulatory framework to expedite and enhance the ability of teachers to move across state lines.
LawCode: Add Art 25 ยง1300, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to adopting the interstate teacher mobility compact
